General.Name: Shenergy Co Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Shenergy Company Limited engages in the development, construction, and operation management of electric power, oil, and natural gas projects in China. It has installed capacity of 16.114 million kilowatts. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

0.Name: Ms. Feng  Xie
